Service Details: - Helps people with disabilities obtain BC Disability Benefits, and Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits- Assists people receiving provincial disability benefits to file their income taxes through our Tax AID DABC program- Provides information on Registered Disability Savings: Personal Assistance, offers Advocacy Access Publications, online Disability Benefits FAQs pages- Offers workshops to share info on provincial and federal disability benefits
Address & Map: 456 Broadway W, #204Vancouver, BC     V5Y 1R3View MapQuest Map
Former Name: BC Coalition of People with Disabilities
